description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The follow up to the number one music package on XBOX Live Indie Games, ezmuze+2 gives you more control, more freedom and more than 1000 loops!
description.short: The follow up to the number one music package on XBOX Live Indie Games, ezmuze+2 gives you more control, more freedom and more than 1000 loops!
